div.p: I\'m a nomad Software Engineer, always searching for the next challenge; no task is too scary nor too difficult. Lately I have been immersed in the crypto-world working for Radix, a London based startup trying to create the next massive scalable DLT. I'm one of the two guys behind all the JS related stuff.
I feel comfortable working on the front-end, going from pure CSS & HTML5 to Sass, Bootstrap or AngularJS/2+, VueJS and whatever!
My main development languages are Java and JavaScript, but I have worked with Go, Python, PHP and more..
Git, Gulp, Grunt, NPM, Linux, Docker, you name it, I have used a bajillion tools!
